caption.p: A Location of Lago Verdarolo in the Northern Apennines (northern Italy). The inset map shows the location of Italy (IT) in Europe. B Topographic map of the Tuscan-Emilian Apennines with the location of relevant paleoecological sites: Lago Verdarolo (this paper; Samartin and others 2017) and Prato Spilla area (five sites, Prato Spilla Aâ€“E; Lowe 1992; Ponel and Lowe 1992).
